summary: Defines the command‑line interface for the ansible‑test tool, constructing the top‑level argument parser, registering sub‑command modules (coverage, environment, integration, sanity, shell, units) and wiring up auto‑completion and display utilities.
business_intent: Enable users to invoke the various ansible‑test testing commands through a consistent CLI, handling argument parsing, sub‑command dispatch, and optional colored output.
